plot: This one shot special was one of the first game shows produced for American television. Contestants answered clues to try and identify an item hidden behind a curtain.
title: Fun and Fortune
plot_es: This one shot special was one of the first game shows produced for American television. Contestants answered clues to try and identify an item hidden behind a curtain.
plot_en: This one shot special was one of the first game shows produced for American television. Contestants answered clues to try and identify an item hidden behind a curtain.
